name: Headstart
body:
# Headstart - Make beautiful webpages Headstart is a CSS framework. [View us on jsDelivr](http://www.jsdelivr.com/projects/headstart-css)! ***We now have a release date! October 28th, 2016! (NOTE: The release date may change.)*** ## Features: - [x] Brand Colors (Info, Success, Warning, Danger) - [x] Responsive Grid - [x] Typography - [x] [Ionicons](http://www.ionicons.com/) Icon font - [ ] Navbars - [x] Mobile-first - [x] Code views - [ ] Responsive ``s - [ ] Panels, Thumbnails, Cards - [ ] Custom forms - [ ] Color palates - [ ] Carousels - [x] CDN / Self-hosting ## Install ***Note: The files that are currently marked as `"SOON"` will be added later.*** To use raw.githack.com's CDN: ``` html ``` To use rawgit.com's CDN: ``` html ``` To use jsDelivr's awesome CDN ***RECCOMMENDED***: ``` html ``` To use self-hosting: Download Headstart from [here](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/headstart-css/0.3.1/headstart-css.zip), extract it somewhere in your website, then: ``` html ``` ## How to use icons To use the icons, add a `` or a `` with `class="ion-XXX"` when `XXX` is the icon name.
For example: ``` html

Example

``` ## Versioning The versioning system for stable releases is `MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH` (Semantic versioning). The versioning system for unstable (development) releases is `vMAJORDEV-YEARwWEEK-REVISION` (For example, the second release for v2 on week 21, 2017 is `v2-17w21-b`.)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
